---
name: "DBC Research Ticket Template Kit - 17: Synthesize research"
about: To guide the synthesis of data collected from the study. 
labels: "disability-benenfits,research" 
assignees: ''

---

### Description
This ticket covers synthesizing data from the [study name] study. The study focuses on [brief description of study]. 

#### Timeframe for this ticket
This work should fit within one sprint.

#### Output
[Add link to synthesis Mural]

### Tasks
- [ ] Aggregate evidence across study sessions (notes, like documents and mural boards, recordings, transcripts, etc.)
- [ ] Identify patterns and themes across evidence, and answer research questions
- [ ] Review research goals, questions, and hypotheses to make sure they have all been addressed in the synthesis

### Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Research synthesis is complete

### Further information
Review relevant [Platform guidance](https://depo-platform-documentation.scrollhelp.site/research-design/research-synthesis) as needed.
